episodes.title: Tu Beer Hai
episodes.description: Naveen is pissed off at his company for not letting him lead a project, for which he worked really hard. His mentor Bhati asks him a fundamental question 'What are you?'. Naveen and his friends discover the answer to it in different ways.

episodes.title: And Then There Were Four
episodes.description: While the whole idea of startup is of 3 friends. Naveen's roommate and IIM graduate Mandal want to enter the team and make the 3 realize why they need him.

episodes.title: The Jury Room
episodes.description: Now the team is united, ready for their start-up. But, Funding? Investors? Naveen and the guys go around the town looking for investors discovering the plethora of start-ups.

episodes.title: Bulb Jalega Boss
episodes.description: Naveen, Mandal and Yogi pick up from where they left off to make it or break it at the event under any circumstance, while Jeetu has an agenda of his own to take care at home. The events unfold parallel to each other.

episodes.title: Where Magic Happens
episodes.description: The Team get into a new problem when their idea is hacked by another team and they fight through emotions and misunderstandings to get what they rightfully deserve. Mandal steps up for the team and show his value to the team.

episodes.title: The Valley
episodes.description: The pitchers are on the verge of a breakthrough as they await major funding. They must convince KC Enterprises, an offline player in the same sector, to partner with them.

episodes.title: The Pivot
episodes.description: After the deal's failure, Naveen decides to revamp the company. But Prachi presents a new condition to support the change - find a new CTO in 3 days.

episodes.title: The Sprint
episodes.description: The company goes on a sprint to finish a product within 30 days. However, just 3 days before the launch, the pitchers face a new problem - resignations.

episodes.title: The North Star Metric
episodes.description: Post the product launch, the three pitchers chase their own North Star Metrics: valuation, money in the bank, and employee satisfaction. Where does this search lead them?

episodes.title: The Term Sheet
episodes.description: With the founders not talking to each other and no investments in sight, friendships seem to perish.
